parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Item for which to get a value (see Remarks )

title: ISimpleFilletFeatureData2.GetConicRhoOrRadius
description: Gets the conic rho or radius of this fillet/chamfer.

parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Item for which to get a value (see Remarks )

remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::GetFilletItemAtIndex
to get the pointer with which to specify PFilletItem.
The type of value returned by this method corresponds to the
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::ConicTypeForCrossSectionProfile
setting.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
